SA15n1267:3: iha jagati jāgrato jīvalokasya nīlavipulacalacetanīyanicūlanicayādau cakṣuṣo vikṣepādanantaraṃ nīlādisvalakṣaṇaniṣṭho (2)
SA15n1267:6: -gā hi paricchedaśaktiḥ samvedanānāmasti cānayornīlabhirbhāsatā nīlanirṇayanibandhanaṃ tenobhayamapi bhayabhraṣṭaṃ nīlameva paricchinattīti sampratyayaḥ sāṃvya-(4)
SA15n1267:11: tataḥ paraṃ punarvastu dharmerjātyādibhiryayā buddhayāvasīyate sāpi pratyakṣatvena sammateti vikalpakamadhya(6)
SA15n1267:16: kintarhi madhyāvasthālakṣaṇajñānagrāhyākārātsmaraṇābhogādisahitādaniṣṭhitamitīṣṭaṃ nirṇayanibandhanaṃ punaratranetranīlādyarthāpāye'pi nīlākṣismaraṇasaṃkāntanīlādinirbhāsaḥ kutaḥ saṃbobhavīṃta |
SA15n1267:21: nīlādyākāraleśo yaḥ sa tasmin kena nirmitaḥ ||
SA15n1267:28: idaṃ tu vikalpakaṃ nīlādyākṛtisākṣarākāraṃ ca sujñātamantarmātrādipari (4)
SA15n1267:30: tena na jātyādiparicchedadarpo dvitīyapratyayasya tatpratyanīkarūpādiḥ rūpatvāt |
SA15n1267:31: na hi yatra yasya pratibhāso'saṃbhāvī sa tasya grāhakaḥ pratya-(5)
SA15n1267:33: tathe damapi nīlādinirbhāsi na tatsvabhāvaśūnyajātyādisaṃvedi vyavasthāpyamāpadyate |
SA15n1267:43: tenedaṃ paraprauḍhaśāstrakṛdbhirapitatpratyayamadhikṛtyocyamānaṃ na mānasasparśiprekṣasya kṣaṇikatvānupapattiścānugata vyavavahārānanyathā siddheḥ śabdaliṅgavikalpāhi sādhāraṇaṃ rūpamanupasthāpayanto na tṛṇakubjīkaraṇe'pi samarthā ityavivādaṃ,
SA15n1267:48: tatra na prathama pakṣaḥ taddhi tāvadanubhabādeva tathā vyavasthāpyaṃtasyālīkatvenānullekhāt |
SA15n1267:53: nahi śabdaliṅgābhyāmiha mahīdharoddeśe'nagni rna bhavatīti skuraṇamapi tvagnirastī-(4) ti |
SA15n1267:55: yasmādiha dharādharaviśmbharāyāṃ vibhāvasurastīti dhanañjayākāradhāritvādvodhasya tena bodhena dhanañjaya evāvabuddhaḥ |
SA15n1267:60: tāvattenaivānubhave netyādi bhāṣāmapi tāvadabhyasya nirākāravādinā hi dravyavadekānekavicāracakranikṛttatayā nīlādyākārameva cetaścakramalīkamabhilapyate tadapi na svānubhavaprabhāvādapi tu bādhakabodhādhīnaṃtat |
SA15n1267:68: tatrāpyanyāpohe śabdārthena vyāvṛttiranyānya eva vyāvṛttestu vyāvṛttairnivartamānasya tadabhāvaprasaṅgāt |
SA15n1267:69: tathā ca (2) pravṛttera pyabhāvaḥ tasmādya eva vyāvṛtta sa eva vyāvṛttaśabdapravṛttibhedaśca rsaketabhedānuvācyabhedo'sti |
SA15n1267:71: calanāt, tathā ca vyatirekiṇyā vibhakteraprayogaḥ tasyābhedāśrayatvāt |
SA15n1267:74: na vai śabdārtha kācidviṣayasvabhāvāyattā vuttirityato vṛttyabhāvaprasaṃgāt yathā vyatirikte'vyatirikte vā prayoktumiṣyante tathā nirmuktāstamarthamapratibandhena prakāśayanti |
SA15n1267:76: tvamityekārthābhidhāne'pi kasyacidviśeṣasya pratyayena virudhyate saṃketabhede vyatiriktārthā vibhaktirarthāntaramivādarśayantī pratibhātyanarthāntare'pi tathā prayoga (6)
SA15n1267:78: na tāvat sarvatra bhedaḥ anyatrāpi puruṣa iva tasya pratibandhābhāvāt |
SA15n1267:79: yathaikaṃ kvacidekatra cānena khyāpyate tadaviśeṣe'pi gauravādi khyā- (7)
SA15n1267:80: -panārthaṃ bahuvacanena prayogābhāvāttu saṃketabhedo na syāt anyasyaiva,
SA15n1267:81: tathāhi bhedāntareṇa yadi bhaṇitasyārthaḥ yadāyaṃ pratipattā tadanyavyavacchedabhāvānapekṣaḥ (8)
SA15n1267:82: piṇḍaviśeṣe'śvavyavacchedamātraṃ jijñāsate tathābhūtajñāpanāt tathā ca bhedasaṅketena śabdena bodhyate'naśvatvamasyāstīti yadā punarvyavacchedāntaranirāṅkṣyastaṃjñā-(9)
SA15n1267:83: -tumicchati tadā'parityakta vyavacchedāntaraṃ tamevāśvaparicchedāntaraṃ tamevāśvaparicchedaṃ tathā prakāśanāya pramucyate anaśvāyamiti |
SA15n1267:84: ata eva pūrvatra pratiṣṭhitapadāntaratvācchabdapravṛtterna samānādhikaraṇyaṃ viśeṣyabhāvo vā gotvamasya śuklamiti tanmātraviśeṣeṇa vuddhe stadāśrayabhūtāyā ekatvenāpratibhāsanāt |
SA15n1267:86: tathā saṃketavyavahāreṇa saṃketasakalavyacchedadharme vibhāgavat ekasya bahujanena pratibhāsanāt vyavacchedāntarasākāṃkṣatvācca |
SA15n1267:89: tasmānna sarvatra dharmadharmivācinoḥ śabdayorvācye'rthe niścayapratyayavirodhatvena kaścidviśeṣaḥ ekastameva pratyāyanapratikṣiptabhedāntaraḥ pratyāyati (3)
SA15n1267:92: anyena vā yadi brūyāt bhedo nāsti tato'paraḥ ||
SA15n1267:93: etāvantameva ca bhedaṃ darśanaṃ śuddhistena....vāde jā-(4)
SA15n1267:94: -yeta pācakatvamiti kadā vā pāa iti anyena vā tathābhūtajñāpanāya svayaṃkṛtena samayena na punastathā mūtābhidhānamātreṇārthāntaramevaitadbhavati tathābhūtasyaiva jñā-(5)
SA15n1267:97: na pācaka eva atra pākena anya eva kaścitpācako nāmābhidhīyate pāka vicintyate |
SA15n1267:98: yat pu-(6)-narasyāmidheyaṃ tat kaścittaṃ taveva pācakatvenāpītyayam |
SA15n1267:109: na hi avayavī pratiṣedhasādhāraṇaṃ kvāpi upalabdhaṃ yena tattvābhāve paramāṇuṣu na syāttathā pratighātādayaḥ | atha
SA15n1267:113: kevalā avyāhataparasparāntarānupradeśāḥ kathamāvaraṇatvāt jātasya vātra ucyate |
SA15n1267:114: asaṃsṛṣṭāḥ kathamavayavinaṃ jāyante saṃsargaśca naikadā tadabhāvāt na sarvātmanā'ṇumātrapiṇḍaprasaṅgāt saṃyogasya padārthāntarasya jananena cet tameva saṃyogaṃ sāntarāḥ kathaṃjayantīti samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ |
SA15n1267:117: atha sāntarā eva saṃyogamavayavinañca janayanti tathā satyavaraṇādikāryamapi kiṃna janayanti |
SA15n1267:121: na khalu saṃyogaḥ pratibhāsate saṃyoge vyatiriktaḥ,
SA15n1267:122: kevalamasaṃyuktayoḥ sāvasthānopalabhyate tau punarupalabhyete tato'nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kalpa-(4)
SA15n1267:124: apratyakṣeṇa te tathābhūtaṃ sacaivaṃbhūtaṃ jātamiti pratītiḥ |
SA15n1267:125: tataḥ saivāvasthā pṛthagbhāvena jñāpyate saṃyoga iti | ataeva |
SA15n1267:128: na śabdajñānena vailakṣyamātrādeva padārthabhedo'pitu pratyakṣalakṣaṇajñānabhedāt vikalpi-(6)
SA15n1267:129: -kāhi buddhiranādivāsanāsāmarthyādupajāyamānā tathā tathā plavate tato nārthatattvaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate |
SA15n1267:130: tathānvayavyatirekeṇa parikalpitaṃ bhedamāśritya saṃyogādibūddhayaḥ tataḥ parikalpitasyaiva cotpādanārthatatvasya kalpitārthabhedastu tīrthyāntaradarśanādapyupajāyate |
SA15n1267:134: tato bhinnaśabdaḥ jñānañca vikalpite vastuni vāsanāyā anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pravartate kiṃ bhūto'sau vikalpo vastu-(9)
SA15n1267:136: na vyāvṛttādanyā vyāvṛttiḥ tataḥ sa eva santānāpekṣayā'rthāntarabhedo bhedena pratibhāti vastubhedama-(10)
SA15n1267:138: yathā eko guṇaḥ ekaḥ samavāyaścaturviśatiḥ guṇāḥ |
SA15n1267:140: sa eva sarvabhāveṣu hetuḥ kinneṣyate tayoḥ ||
SA15n1267:143: -paṇānusmaraṇagṛhītatvena kṣaṇaṃ tadeva nimittamastu vartamānepi saṃyukto ghaṭa ityādāvapi ||
SA15n1267:151: nanūpacāro hi nāma mukhyanibandhanaḥ sa kathamasati mukhye bhavet |
SA15n1267:154: ṇatve maulī vyavasthitiḥ bhavatastu pūrvapūrvakalpanākṛtaviśeṣaṇayogādabhinnaviśeṣaṇatvenamukhyatvaṃ kvaciditi nopacārasaṃbhavaḥ |
SA15n1267:161: askhalan gatipratyayaviṣayo hi mukhyaḥ tadaparastu gauṇa iti kinna paryāpyam |
SA15n1267:164: ityabhinnārthatā paryāyatā rūpābhedena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhinnaviṣayatve hi tadbhavati na buddhaya evahi sva vāsa-(9)
SA15n1267:165: -nānurodhādupajāyamānā bhedābhedasāmānādhikaraṇyādivyavahāramuparacayanti na paryāyatādiprasaṅgaḥ anarthāntaratve'pi dṛśyante aparyāyā akarmmadravyam,
SA15n1267:167: tatra kiṃ vyāvṛttibheda eva nibandhanaṃ nāparaḥ pravṛttinimittabhedaḥ gauḥ śuklo gauḥ śabdatvamiti | punaḥ
SA15n1267:174: gauriti tadekākāraparāmarśayogī sakala eva padārtha ucyate |
SA15n1267:175: śukla iti tadekadeśaḥ parāmarśāntarayoginī ca vartamānā vyatirekaśca anvayavyatire-(4)
SA15n1267:177: tatastasya gauḥ śuklo guṇa iti vyatirekavibhaktistadyathā “śilāputrakasya śarīraṃ rāhoḥ śiraḥ” |
SA15n1267:178: yadā ca gavākārāvagrahau nāsti śuklatvameva kevalamupalabhya-(5)
SA15n1267:180: tadā praśnayati kasyeda śuklatvamiti tadāpūrvadarśanāt avadhṛtagosvabhāvo nirdiśati gauriti tādātmyasambandha evāsya vivakṣito-(6)
SA15n1267:182: yadā tu kevalenānena bhavitavyaṃ yadi nāma viśeṣopalakṣaṇamandatā mandalocanānāṃ tathāpi śuklenānena gavānyena bha-(7)
SA15n1267:184: kī'yaṃ śuklo gauranyo veti tadā prativacanaṃ gauriti |
SA15n1267:200: vastucintā tu lokasya neti bhedo na bādhyate |
SA15n1267:202: rūpaṃ rūpasya rūpamiti vat syāt tadvyatiriktasyābhāvāt na |
SA15n1267:205: ato na rūpaṃ ghaṭa ityekādhikaraṇā śrutiḥ |
SA15n1267:214: kṛtasamaratvaṃ taddhitāt hastitvam atra jātimātramucyate na sambandhaḥ taddhitādabhinnarūpācchuklatvaṃ matvarthīyāntopi prakṛtyā tulyarūpatvāt |
SA15n1267:216: kṛdanto'vyabhicaritasambandhaḥ saditi na sattāṃ padārtho vyabhicarati tena sa eva sambandho vācya iti śābdanyāyāt |
SA15n1267:217: kathaṃ pācakapācakatvayoreka evārtha iti cet na kriyāsamavāyayornirākṛtatvāt,
SA15n1267:225: sa evātadbhedatve samānādhikaraṇyābhāva na hyasatyāṃ vyāptau sāmānādhikaraṇyamasti |
SA15n1267:229: jātiśca svarūpañca śabdasya ca upasarjanaṃ dravyamuktaṃ na tadvat ghaṭādibhedastadubhayavyavadhinā ṣāratantryaṃ tataścana ghaṭatvāīnākṣipati |
SA15n1267:232: svataḥ yathā rūpaśabdenānākṣiptairmmadhurādibhinnasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ śuklamambumiti tadvat pakṣopavandanaṃ tatpratyākhyātamityācāryavacanai bhāṣyakāra vyākhyāne ca pracarati |
SA15n1267:235: na hyaghaṭo nāstītyeva ghaṭārthī pravartate api ghaṭo'stītyādi” yato'ghaṭo nāstītyanyanivṛttirghaṭo vāstīti aghaṭādanyā ihāstīti aghaṭalakṣaṇā-(4)
SA15n1267:237: ghaṭākāraghaṭitaghoṣonmīṣitamanīṣāyā eva ghaṭaviśeṣe apratiṣṭhitāyāḥ aghaṭavyāvṛttaghaṭe pravṛttinimittatvena nirūpaṇāt |
SA15n1267:239: tena aghaṭasyaiva nivṛttiriti pratītau nāyaṃ doṣa iti cet,
SA15n1267:244: tadanupalambharūpatvā diti kathitamevaṃ prathamaṃ bādhakapratyayāduttarasamayasambhavinaḥ punastadalīkatvakalpanamekeṣām |
SA15n1267:246: vānyāpoho'nyāpoḍharūpatvādvidhiriti cet na alauṃkapakṣe tadabhāvāt tasya svarūpavidhānavalīkatvaprasaṅgāt |
SA15n1267:248: ghaṭasārūpyasphuraṇenāghaṭanivṛttasthūlamūlavastuvidhiravibhūta eva buddhayāpyavasīyate tadūrdhvaṃ dhvaṃsate bādhakāditi ko'parādhaḥ prathamabodhasya prathamabodhāpekṣayā(10)
SA15n1267:249: ca idamudīryate tvayā vikalpe svalakṣaṇānārohāditi na saṅgataṃ sajātīyavijātīṃyavyāvṛttapratiṣṭhitaghaṭākārapaṭu pratyakṣāpekṣayā vastu svalakṣaṇamucyate |
SA15n1267:250: tadeva vastuvijātīyatvāvṛttamullikhatā vikalpena samārūpyavaśāt sāmānyalakṣaṇamadhyavasāyaṃ vikalpamityucyate-tadapi sthūlamūlasvarūpa [2] sparśādyatiriktajātyādipadārthānupalambhāt,
SA15n1267:253: ubhayato vyāvṛttasya hitadekasmādapi tasya vyavacchedo'stīti na hyanīlamutpalaṃ na bhavatīti bhaṇyate |
SA15n1267:263: vidhirapi vidhirūpatāyāmavidhi dharmatvaṃ vyavacchinnasvabhāvamapekṣamāṇaḥ kathaṃ [6] na sāpekṣaḥ |
SA15n1267:264: “tataḥ pratītāvitaretarāśrayatvamuktaṃ saṅketesañcārya yatparihṛtaṃ jñānaśriyā tadetat grāmyajanadhandhīkaraṇaṃ golakādiṃvat,
SA15n1267:265: sthānāntarasañcārān” iti mitrapādān prati upālambho na śakyaḥ vidhisphuraṇasyaiva svīkārāt sa ca vidhiḥ śabdāt pratīyamānaḥ saṃketānusāreṇa pratyetavyaḥ,
SA15n1267:266: saṃketaśca nāpratīte'rthe tasmāt [8] saṅkete kathaṃ sañcārya parihṛtaḥ parasparāśrayadoṣaḥ tathā coktam
SA15n1267:279: eka pratyavamarśākhye jñāne ekatra hi sthitaḥ ||
SA15n1267:284: idameva paramasubhāṣitāmṛtamapi ca te sādhūriti piṣṭaṃ piṣyate [3] yatpunaratī(ti)
SA15n1267:288: kiñciditi hi vidhyarthī na kiñciditi cālīkārthaḥ |
SA15n1267:293: tataśca dvividho vidhiḥ pāramā [5] rthi ko yasyārthasya sannidhānā sannidhānābhyāṃ jñānapratibhāsabhedastatsvalakṣaṇaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ tattvaṃ vastutaḥ tadeva paramārthasat arthakriyāsāmarthyalakṣaṇatvā [6] dvastunaḥ |
SA15n1267:295: adhyavaseyaviṣayabhedastu tiryagūrdhvatātmakāni yatropayogā tadrūpaparāvṛ[7] ttaghaṭādisvabhāvaḥ svalakṣaṇamevaikato vyāvṛttamucyate utpalavat |
SA15n1267:302: pratyakṣavikalpe ca ghaṭa eva sphurati kevalaṃ ekatra sphuṭatayā anyatrāsphuṭatayā na ca viśeṣaṇabhedena viśeṣyamapi bhidyate |
SA15n1267:303: tenobhayathāpi ghaṭa evāyamudayanācāryaḥ dṛśyavikalpyāvarthau ekīkṛtya vyavahārapravṛttiriti vyākhyātarambha alīkānalīkatvādiyathāruci racayanti na vyavahartāraḥ iti puruṣadvayāpekṣayā pi tu jñānasya svākāravaśādgrahaṇaṃ [2] sādhāraṇameva |
SA15n1267:304: anyathā hi bādhakapratyayabalāt alīkākāravikalpacalanādeva tathātva kathaṃ sthāpyaṃ tadarthākāratvañca |
SA15n1267:306: parastu pāramārthi [3] kaḥ śabdajñānagṛhīto ca iti manyate tena tadabhimānasthalo'yaṃ bādhakāvatāraḥ tadevamubhayato vyāvṛttaghaṭākāraṃ jñānagrāhyaṃ grahaṇamekato vyāvṛttākāraṃ jñānaṃ grahaṇam [4]vyavasāya iti pratītidvayavyavasthā |
SA15n1267:308: sa ca vidhirapi pratītyartho [5] pi na sambhavati,
SA15n1267:309: vikalpe svalakṣaṇasyānyavyāvṛttatayā saṃsparśāt virodhāt ubhayato vyāvṛttasyāpi ghaṭasya vijātīyavyāvṛttaghaṭamātragrahaṇāt sajātīyabhe-[5]-dagrahaṇa sāmarthyāt |
SA15n1267:313: ubhayorāpi grāhakavikalpaāsthākāravilāsāt prakārāntatveṇāprathanām prathamā na rūpasambhavavācyakālpanikasyāpyaṃśa(8)
SA15n1267:314: bhāvasyāta eva na mūlo niṣṭhuranyāyakṣaṇaraprahāra pratyāśāparasya |
SA15n1267:315: anyopohalakṣaṇaśabdārthe jātidharmmāpi kalpyamānā ekatvanityatva nityatvapratyekaparisamāptatvalakṣaṇā vya-[9]-vatiṣṭhante |
SA15n1267:322: yathā tāvadabhedapratyayajananasāmagrī yadutārthamekaṃ śrāvaṇeyaṃ avalokya dvitīyaṃ cākaleyaṃ anyaṃ vā govyaktibhedamavadhārayanna bhinnapratyayavān bhavati ayamapi gaurayamapi gauriti aparāparālokane ca vardhamānā bhinnabuddhitvādvardhamā (2)
SA15n1267:323: naṃ sāmānyamāmnāyate abhedaśca gopiṇḍamaṇḍalānāṃ khaṇḍamuṇḍādibhede'pi vijātīyamātrābhinnārthapratīteḥ |
SA15n1267:324: padārthānāmeva dharmmaḥ sajātīyādapi viśeṣapratītau bheda pratītiriti vyavahāraḥ samastagopiṇḍamaṇḍalapradhvaṃsābhāvān,
SA15n1267:328: tadapekṣayāmi yadamunā pratītaṃ tadātadanyathākartumaśakyaṃ alīkakalpanayā vastupratibaddha(5)
SA15n1267:333: sa ca vāstavo'pi samvādāt kālpaniko pi kalpanā buddhau vivartanāt |
SA15n1267:336: yathā hi smaraṇamanatītamapi svayamatītatvaṃ smarati tathedamapi āropitastūcyate,
SA15n1267:337: yacca padārtho vikalpārūḍhagrāhyākārapratibhāsādgahītaḥ sa āropita ucyate,
SA15n1267:338: yathā bāhyārthābhāve'piṃ saṃnidhāne'saṃnidhāne vā śītārthena vahniñcintitastatra vahnirubhayavyāvṛtto nāsti vijātīyavyāvṛttastvāsti cintā sā-(9)
SA15n1267:339: -rūpyavaśāt pratītaḥ sa āropita ucyate asatvyāpītyapi bādhakapratyayavaśena tathātvāvasthābhedāgraho'pi vijātīyabhedapratīte sajātīyādbhedagrahaṇasāmarthyam |
SA15n1267:353: anyatrāpi pāramārthikabhedapratīto kathamabheda āropyatāmiti cet evaṃ tarhi yasya pratibhāse yannāropyate niyamena tasyaivāprakāśe tadāropyaṃ na tvevannāmamātrakasyātiprasañjakatvāt |
SA15n1267:354: ata eva na vyadhikaraṇasyāpi sato'sato vā bhedasyāgrahī'bhedāropopayogīti |

SA15n1267:783: ā. ta. vi. 162-163-“tarhi sphurite svākāra eva pravartayatu tatra pravṛtta eva cārthī tatsadṛśamarthamāsādayati |
